attributes.action: Make it illegal to ride a bicycle on the pavement
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am fed up with being told to 'GET OUT OF THE ******* WAY' by cyclists riding on the footpaths and in pedestrianised shopping centres. It should be illegal and punishable with a hefty fine.

rejection.details: It is already illegal to ride on the pavement, as referred to in the Highway Code Rule 64.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
